basics.name: Andre Mesquita
basics.label: Solution Architect - Software Developer
basics.summary:
Self-taught, proactive, generalist professional with a profile of development and systems integration, having worked for 14 years with development in Delphi and relational databases and in the last 10 years with .NET platform and cloud computing. 

Perhaps the greatest challenge of my career is to identify which part of my profession is not a hobby. The ease of logical understanding and the constant search for knowledge are great drivers of my career.
